pages.text: We can repurpose the $(item)Red Rocks$() into a sturdy building brick by dropping it in some acid, then smelt it down after it has $(item)corroded$().$(br2)The only acid that is available to you right now is the $(item)Etching Acid$().

The $(item)Etching Acid$() is manufactured in the $(item)Pressure Chamber$() by combining $(item)Ammonium Nitrate$() with $(item)Venom Glands$() and $(item)Rotten Flesh$().$(br2)$(item)Venom Glands$() can be acquired by slaying the $(l:sim_3/inhabitants)Scorpions$() that live in the $(item)Arid Waste$().
After smelting the corroded rock it can be crafted into $(item)Nether Brick$(), which is one of the components you need to manufacture the $(item)Combat Simulation Portal Block$().
